title: markko7
author: markko7
created_time: May 18, 2022, 12:37:18 PMLast edit: May 19, 2022, 10:47:51 PM by markko7
content: I want to buy pancake sniper plus from pancakesniperbot.comIf you don't use it anymore I'd like to buy your license for half price max. I prefer escrow but if you have Legendary account I can buy without escrow. PM me your offer.

comments.author: Streamixio
comments.body: I advice asking Stanley - the developer of the bots if he allows reselling. My account on pancakesniperbot.com website is connected with my telegram. If he got message from new TG he could ban the account, not sure, just an idea. But I never saw anyone selling legit copy of those bots. There are a lot of scammers selling "cracked pancake sniper" so be careful.

comments.author: markko7
comments.body: Thanks! Will ask dev first. Do you have it? How it works?

comments.author: Streamixio
comments.body: I have pancake plus, it does the job - some days are good some are worse
